job_title: Data Center Facility Operations Regional Startup Engineer
job_text: ['Find jobs', 'Company Reviews', 'Find salaries', 'Employers', 'Change country', 'Help Center', 'Responsible for the Facility Operations Site Startup project plans for an assigned geographical region. To work closely with those site Facility Operations teams to support meeting all project milestones during construction.', 'Develop and maintain key programs supporting the overall Site Startup effort.', 'Identify and correct gaps in existing processes or lack thereof related to starting up new Data Center facilities.', 'Influence cross-functional partner involvement at both the tactical and strategic level.', 'Serve as a technical/consultative resource concerning operations of Data Center facilities and equipment, specifically for sites in the construction phase.', 'Support hiring and onboarding of Facility Operations personnel. Coordinate manufactured equipment testing participation and personally support when needed.', 'Ensure the General Contractor coordinates vendor training for technical and shift operations personnel.', 'Coordinate with the site teams to establish all required service contracts prior to handover.', 'Develop and approve processes, procedures, and reporting metrics that help drive successful turnover of new Data Centers.', 'Coordinate with the site Facility Operations teams to facilitate execution of the Construction/Facility Operations handover checklist. Verify all deficiencies are documented with temporary mitigations plans in place, and a roadmap exists outlining implementation of final corrective actions and closeout.', 'Interface and coordinate with internal organizations and stakeholders to include Data Center Design, Infrastructure Construction Management, Global Facility Operations Support, Data Center Facilities Engineering Team, Procurement, and Logistics teams to support driving day one readiness.', 'Ability to travel domestically and internationally as needed (25%-50%).', "Bachelor's degree in an engineering or technical discipline (mechanical, electrical, or controls), or 10+ years of experience in one of these disciplines.", 'Experience in working with processes.', '8+ years experience with construction and/or operations of mission critical facilities.', 'Experience leading teams and sub-contractors.', 'Experience educating and influencing cross-functional teams.', 'Experience communicating risk versus benefit.', 'Experience in integrated change management across a global organization.', 'Experience with standard Data Center equipment to include: electrical distribution equipment from switchgear down to panelboards, VFDs, low voltage power and molded case circuit breakers, overhead IT busway, Diesel Generators, DX units, air handling units, water treatment equipment, controls and monitoring, and hot aisle containment accessories.', 'Analytical, and communications experience with proven experience communicating details throughout all organizational levels.']
